vehicles.description: A large truck on the right side of the ego car, appearing to be stationary or moving slowly, occupying the right lane
vehicles.explanation: The truck's size and lane occupation require the ego car to maintain a safe distance and potentially prepare for lane changes or speed adjustments.

traffic cones.description: Orange traffic cones can be seen to the far left, possibly indicating construction or lane closures ahead,
traffic cones.explanation: The presence of cones suggests altered traffic patterns ahead, so the ego car should be cautious and watch for possible detours or reduced lane availability.

suggestions: Maintain a safe following distance from the truck, be prepared for lane changes if the cones indicate a closed lane ahead, observe for any traffic controls that might come into view, and stay alert for construction-related interruptions.
